ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:title: All Hatcheria Cytb sequences, plus outgroups
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:description: Fasta file containing all of the Cytochrome b sequences for Hatcheria macraei, plus outgroup samples. Unique haplotypes are labeled with the haplotype number preceding the isolate label. The isolate label usually consists of the initials of the species (HM, TA) followed by the first four letters of the locality. See readme file for which codes are associated with specific populations.
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:subject: Andes Mountains
Biogeography
Cytochrome b
Glaciation
Trichomycteridae
Drainage reversal
